tutorial.1: Backgammon rules are simple. Move any checker the number of steps the dice rolls.
tutorial.2: You play the black checkers and move them in this direction.
tutorial.3: Opponent plays white and moves in opposite direction.
tutorial.4: When all your checkers has reached inside the home board, they can begin to be removed.
tutorial.5: The player who first removes all checkers, wins the game.
tutorial.6: You can't move to a point which has two or more opponent checkers.
tutorial.7: A lonely checker is called a blot and can be hit by an opponent checker.
tutorial.8: The hit checker has to start over from the bar.
tutorial.9: And lastly, good luck and try to block your opponent!
